entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain with a few thunderstorms ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
